dk.nesos.font
Class BitmapFileFont

java.lang.Object
  dk.nesos.font.BitmapFileFont
All Implemented Interfaces:
BitmapFont
public final class BitmapFileFont
extends java.lang.Object
implements BitmapFont

Reads the .bff file format. This file format is used by Codehead's Bitmap Font Generator (http://www.codehead.co.uk/cbfg) (the fileformat specification is described in the help file)

Author:
ndhb

Constructor Summary
BitmapFileFont(java.lang.String filename)
          Load and parse the .bff file specified by the filename.

Constructor Detail

BitmapFileFont

public BitmapFileFont(java.lang.String filename)
Load and parse the .bff file specified by the filename.

Path is relative to current directory.

Parameters:
filename -
